description: This file is a React component for an applicant assessment page, allowing users to input candidate ID, assessment ID, answers, and score, then submit the assessment via an API call.

methods.name: ApplicantAssessmentsPage
methods.description: React functional component rendering an assessment submission form with state management and API submission logic.

methods.name: onSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission, calls API, manages loading state and displays success/error messages.
